attributes.action: Help out kids with Gaming because parents are poor because of COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: You should do this to prevent kids meeting up and spreading it more you should give them vouchers so that they aren’t bored inside with nothing to buy
attributes.background: You should supply each house/ settlement that involve kids that have access to PS4 or XBOX vouchers to the kids because we have barely any money and that is spent on money

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

The Government is not responsible for providing or funding access to specific recreational activities or platforms.

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Take action to address the rising levels of child poverty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552744
